table.SQL_SELECT_LIST:
set nocount on declare @totalItem int, @totalPage int set @totalItem = ( select count(0) from WCMS_Product { inner join wcms_PageProduct on [PageProduct_ProductID] = Product_ID AND [PageProduct_PageID] = @Search:Product_PageID } where Product_Type = 3 AND Product_SiteID = @siteID AND Product_LanguageID = @langID { AND Product_ID @Search:Product_ID } { AND Product_Code @Search:Product_Code } { AND Product_Title @Search:Product_Title } { AND exists(select top 1 null from [dbo].[F_001_StringToTable](Product_Tags, ',') where LTRIM(RTRIM(Data)) = @Search:Product_Tags) } ) if (@pageSize < 1) set @pageSize = 10 set @totalPage = ceiling(@totalItem * 1.0 / @pageSize) if (@pageIndex < 1) set @pageIndex = 1 if (@pageIndex > @totalPage) set @pageIndex = @totalPage select [Product_ID] ,[Product_Title] ,[Product_ImageLink] ,[Product_O] ,case when [Product_A] = 1 then 'checked' else '' end as [Product_A] ,0 as [locked] ,case when (Select count(0) from wcms_ProductComment where ProductComment_ItemID = [Product_ID]) > 0 then 'view' else '' end as [Comment_Count] ,1 as [Comment_Type] ,[Product_Code] ,replace(CONVERT(varchar, Product_Price2, 1), '.00', '') + isnull(N'
' + Product_PriceText + N'
','') as Product_Price2 ,replace(CONVERT(varchar, Product_Price1, 1), '.00', '') as Product_Price1 from ( select top (@pageIndex * @pageSize) ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY {@Sort} {@Asc}) as [num] ,[Product_ID] ,Product_Title + '' + (case when Product_Tags is null then '' else '
Tags: ' + Product_Tags + '
' end) + '' as [Product_Title] ,[Product_ImageLink] ,[Product_O] ,[Product_A] ,[Product_Code] ,Product_Price2 ,Product_Price1 ,Product_PriceText from WCMS_Product { inner join wcms_PageProduct on [PageProduct_ProductID] = Product_ID AND [PageProduct_PageID] = @Search:Product_PageID } where Product_Type = 3 AND Product_SiteID = @siteID AND Product_LanguageID = @langID { AND Product_ID @Search:Product_ID } { AND Product_Code @Search:Product_Code } { AND Product_Title @Search:Product_Title } { AND exists(select top 1 null from [dbo].[F_001_StringToTable](Product_Tags, ',') where LTRIM(RTRIM(Data)) = @Search:Product_Tags) } ) tb where [num] between (@pageIndex - 1 ) * @pageSize + 1 and @pageIndex * @pageSize select @totalItem, @pageSize, @pageIndex
table.SQL_LOAD_EDIT:
set nocount on declare @pageList nvarchar(max) set @pageList = '' select @pageList = @pageList + ';' + convert(nvarchar(10), PageProduct_PageID) from wcms_PageProduct where PageProduct_ProductID = @editID if (@pageList <> '') set @pageList = substring(@pageList, 2, len(@pageList) - 1)
select [Product_ID] ,[Product_Code] ,[Product_Title] ,[Product_O] ,[Product_A] ,[Product_Brief] ,[Product_Description] ,[Product_ImageLink] ,[Product_Images] ,[Product_ImageType] ,[Product_PublishingDate] ,[Product_Tags] ,[Product_Viewed] ,[Product_Hot] ,[Product_MetaTitle] ,[Product_MetaKeywords] ,[Product_MetaDescription] ,[Product_File] ,[Product_Link] ,[Product_Property] ,@pageList as [ProductPageList] ,'' as [Product_TitleUrl] ,'' as [Product_FullText] ,[Product_Price2] ,[Product_Price1] ,Product_P1 ,Product_P2 ,Product_PriceText from WCMS_Product where Product_ID = @editID
table.SQL_UPDATE_ACTIVE: Update WCMS_Product set [Product_A] = @active where Product_ID = @editID Select @editID
table.SQL_DELETE:
set nocount on declare @id int set @id = @delID
Delete wcms_ProductKeyword where ProductKeyword_ProductID = @id Delete wcms_PageProduct where PageProduct_ProductID = @id Delete wcms_ProductComment where ProductComment_ItemID = @id set nocount off
Delete WCMS_Product where Product_ID = @id Select @@ROWCOUNT
